title: Client Crashing (Constantly)
body: Clients been crashing all the time lately and I just dodged my promo only seconds after clicking accept involuntarily. I'm on a great win streak and this constant crashing is now causing me to lose promos and lose LP for almost no reason. It's really stressing me out, I now have to wait 30 mins and all my friends can't queue with me because of something out of my control.

replies.body: i am having the exact same problem.  And I agree its there client that's crashing and its only started doing it since new patch, and I DONT  WANT TO REINSTALL 15 gig of game and patches its not my comp its  a problem with the client...

Disconnecting or crashing (particularly in champ select) is usually a result of a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
